cards.message: If you or your parents tap fruits to know if it is a good fruit, take
If you crave boba milk tea after a meal, take
If your parents wont accept anything less than A+, take
If your parents say finish your bowl of rice or your future married partner will have spots, take
If your parents don't say I love you, take
If your last name is Wang, Wong, Chan, Chen, Lee, Li, Le, take
